verses.verse: "Listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, <S%H7291><s%> you who follow after righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> you who seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> to the rock <S%H6697><s%> you were cut <S%H2672><s%> from, <S%H4718><s%> and to the hold of the pit <S%H953><s%> you were dug from. <S%H5365><s%>

Awake, <S%H5782><s%> awake, <S%H5782><s%> put on <S%H3847><s%> strength, <S%H5797><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> awake, <S%H5782><s%> as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of old, <S%H5769><s%> the generations <S%H1755><s%> of ancient <S%H6924><s%> times. <S%H2672><s%> Isn't it you who cut Rahab <S%H7294><s%> in pieces, <S%H2490><s%> who pierced the monster? <S%H8577><s%>

Isn't <S%H2717><s%> it you who dried up the sea, <S%H3220><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> deep; <S%H8415><s%> who made <S%H7760><s%> the depths <S%H4615><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> for the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> to pass over? <S%H5674><s%>

I have put <S%H7760><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and have covered <S%H3680><s%> you in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of my hand, <S%H3027><s%> that I may plant <S%H5193><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and lay the foundations <S%H3245><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'You are my people.'"

Awake, <S%H5782><s%> awake, <S%H5782><s%> stand up, <S%H6965><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> that have drunk <S%H8354><s%> at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> of his wrath; <S%H2534><s%> you have drunken <S%H8354><s%> the bowl <S%H6907><s%> of the cup <S%H3563><s%> of staggering, <S%H8653><s%> and drained it. <S%H4680><s%>

These two <S%H8147><s%> things have happened <S%H7122><s%> to you. <S%H5110><s%> Who will bemoan you? <S%H7701><s%> Desolation and destruction, <S%H7667><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> and the sword; <S%H2719><s%> how shall I comfort you? <S%H5162><s%>
